original_title: 16-hour water cut in parts of Colombo tomorrow
original_body_lines: The water supply for parts of Colombo will be suspended tomorrow (Dec.09) for a period of 16 hours, the National Water Supply & Drainage Board (NWSDB) says.
Water cut will be in place from 5:00 p.m. tomorrow until 9:00 a.m. on Sunday (Dec.10).

According to the NWSDB, Colombo 11, 12, 13, 14 and 15 areas are supposed to be affected by the water cut, which is attributed to the essential maintenance work planned under the Ambatale Water Supply System Improvements and Energy Saving Project.
